name: IPE
tagline: A Programming Language based on Java
body:
### Welcome to IPE
IPE is programming language based on java made for those who want to start programming language chapter in life. This programming language is us user friendly and keywords are easy . Any one can do basic program with this currently it is written temper but shell temper we are working we will add soon

### Why This IPE
IPE is made for those children those who have interested in programming. Also this programming language is made by teen 15 year old teen. So the programming language is not good enough for high programming language

### How Does It Works
Its write a java from ipe script and execute and give the output

###How to Use
Linux:: Clone this repo Open Terminal cd to dist folder of clone repo then type chmod +x ./ipe_linux then type ./ipe_linux you are done

Windows:: Dobule click on the jar or double click on the ipe_windows.bat
